channel.title: Fixing my High Alch!

item.title: Fixing my High Alch!
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Okay, I just fixed my High Alch, but the golden glow is too low down for my liking, around knee-height

Here’s what my High-Alch looks like, can anyone help me?

else if(castSpell == 1178) { //High Alch if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { if((!playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)) && ((!playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)) || (!playerHasItemAmount(3054, 1)))) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)) && ((playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)) || (playerHasItemAmount(3054, 1)))) { alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[6]), 6); setAnimation(713); playerGfx(113, 0); deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 1); deleteItem(554,getItemSlot(554), 5); newAnimDelay = 0; newAnim = 713; newAnimDelay = 0; newAnim = 713; newAnimRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 54) { sendMessage("You must have a magic level of 55 to cast High Alchemy."); } } }

Also, I need someone to help me write this something like this:

When you’ve cast high alchemy on an object, it brings you back to the magic book page.

Thanks!

Read full topic
